  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    ConstituentsAction, DetailAction

    public class DatasetBaseAction
extends MemberBaseAction<org.gbif.api.model.registry.Dataset>
    A base action for common dataset pages. TODO: This will be removed as there is no need for such hierarchy.
